title: Michael Emerson in "Person Of Interest - Baby Blue" (www.michaelemerson.it)
author: Chiara Spini
comment: "Oh my, it's a grenade!" "It's just a tear gas grenade" "It's still a grenade!" I love this show way too much.
'Missing'? It was stolen. By some weird-looking... No. You DIDN'T."  Classic!

"Trouble with children, you never know how they are gonna turn out."

Next scene Elias is kidnapping his own father.
whisper shouts John? JOHN!? YOU TRUST HIM WITH A BABY!?!?

I loved this episode so many parts just cracked me up especially the eye witness sketch of Finch, And Finches reaction to the drawing just about killed me, Then Finch and Carter at the grocery store damn I was laughing so hard I couldn't breath Lmao 😅
description: Una combinazione di scene tratte dal 17esimo episodio di "Person of Interest" dal titolo "Baby Blue".
